name: Romanthony
description: '''Anthony Wayne Moore''' (September 5, 1967 â€“ May 7, 2013), known professionally as '''Romanthony''', was an American DJ, record producer, and singer. He worked with French duo [[Daft Punk]], providing vocals for "[[One More Time (Daft Punk song)|One More Time]]" and "Too Long" off their second album, ''[[Discovery (Daft Punk album)|Discovery]]''.
